<Link id="l00026" /><CodeLine lineNumber="26"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// ModelUnderTrainingRunner - training mode implementation. It uses TFLite</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00027" /><CodeLine lineNumber="27"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// to dynamically load and evaluate a TF SavedModel</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// (https://www.tensorflow.org/guide/saved&#95;model) converted to TFLite. see</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// lib/Analysis/models/saved-model-to-tflite.py. Runtime performance is</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// sacrificed for ease of use while training.</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00031" /><CodeLine lineNumber="31"><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">class </span><span class="doxyHighlight">ModelUnderTrainingRunner final : </span><span class="doxyHighlightKeyword">public</span><span class="doxyHighlight"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/mlmodelrunner">MLModelRunner</a> &#123;</span></CodeLine>
